Thanks so much for your contributions yesterday - much appreciated and a great foundation for the afternoon’s discussions and our evolving thinking about how to reach the goals of the network and build its resilience - a key thing is us having language and terms to discuss what it is we are doing!

Steve Rando

Head of Digital Creative, La Trobe University

During my time working with Antonia, she was able to suggest and implement a variety of exceptionally valuable contributions toward streamlining and automating our workflow. Personally, I feel that Antonia brings a wonderful equal balance of technical expertise, and professionalism to her approach

David Seignior

Learning Designer

Antonia unleashes her amazingly diverse range of skills and talents (theatre director, educator, strategy consultant, researcher) to help organisations think differently and ‘do’ better. I couldn’t recommend her more highly to any organisation who wants to learn how to truly harness their human potential for creativity, innovation and sustainability.
